name: Puma Cat Psychic Detective- A Brainwashed Winter
name_original: Puma Cat Psychic Detective- A Brainwashed Winter
description:
Another Puma Cat Paranormal Detective adventure!

Can you clear all the pages in the book and defeat the final boss?

Made for  2D Shooter Jam #1!  Theme = Christmas

I'm glad this jam came up because it was great motivation to make another Puma Cat story with the limited time I had.  I feel like I improve with every jam!  All new enemy sprite art made during the jam, Puma Cat was used from his first story :)

WASD movement and Left-Mouse Click to fire his psychic blasts~

Insta @ nicholas_o514

NeatGames 2019

Text Font by codeman38       
Music by Lucas King (Dark Christmas Collection)
SFX are original and freesound.org
